string.name: name
string.value: Tell Do Gong I Said Hi
Will #b#p2071006##k of #b#m222000000##k regain its lost memory?

#p2071006# told me it now remembers everything that has to do with #b#m250000000##k and #b#p2091001##k, and felt saddened that it hadn't been able to repay #p2091001# for all the good things he did for it due to the injury, and wanted me to say HI to him for it.

I managed to relay #p2071006#'s greetings to #p2091001#. #p2091001# seemed shocked by #p2071006#'s injuries, and wished it a speedy recovery by asking me to deliver #b#p2091002##k to it. Okay, I better go back to #b#p2091002##k, now.

Ah! Hey there! Aren't you the one that gave me #t2022116#? Thanks to you, I finally remember everything on #m250000000#. From learning chess by looking over #p2091001#'s shoulder... to watching #p2091000# diligently train... to seeing #p2091002# secretly eating the #t2022143# that #p2091001# gave away as presents... I REMEMBER THEM ALL!! Thank you so very much!

I wasn't even able to repay #p2091001# for all the good things he did to me... and now my wings are injured so I can't even fly there. I really feel bad about it. If you can... well, if you ever get a chance to head over to #b#m250000000##k, then please tell #b#p2091001##k that Swallow's doing well and that once the wings are healed, I'll be heading over there to say Hi. Can you do that for me?
Thank you so very much!!! I, #p2071006#, never forgets the good deeds from other people! I will repay you one of these days, and you know it! Have a safe trip to #m250000000#~
Do you not plan on visiting #m250000000# ever again? Ahhh... I guess I'll have to wait until my wings get better.
Oh, you're the one that promised me to say Hello to #p2071006# for me. How was it? Did you get to meet #p2071006#? Did you hear anything about it? What? #p2071006# was in #m222000000#?

So... it's injured, can't move, and ... you have to go all the way to check up on it. You must be tired... I mean, it always forgot things even before the injury. I hope it's alright... I'll have to ask for #p2091002# to make a medicine for #p2071006#... I'll let him know that you're on your way, so you should go visit him, get the #bmedicine#k, and give it to #p2071006#.
Have you not gone to #b#m250000000##k, yet? #b#p2091001##k might be very concerned right about now...
